column1: patricia a. saffran| patricia a. saffran. born: september 12
column7: age 83 of forest hill. beloved wife of the late andrew f. saffran; devoted mother of patricia l. mullan and george small
column8: and francine callahan and louis callahan; loving grandmother of andrew mullan and wife melissa
column12: and kyle callahan; cherished great-grandmother of toby mullan
column15: and caring sister of gail stevenson. predeceased by her siblings: frank hauf
column18: and sharon frey. a memorial mass and interment will take place at st. mary of the assumption catholic church in pylesville. date and time will be announced soon. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
